definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The landscape indicated on the section and elevation drawings is the exact site.
sentences.chinese: 剖面圖和立面圖上的景觀都是基地的真實狀態。

sentences.english: I need to see elevations as well.
For some buildings a vertical section is more informative than a plan.
sentences.chinese: 有些建築的立面圖能比平面圖提供更多的信息。

sentences.english: Detailed floor plans and elevations compliment the beautifully presented images.
sentences.chinese: 詳細的平面圖和立面圖以精美圖像呈現。
